nodes.bodyText: I think this condition always matches, so it shouldn't be needed, wdyt?
I don't think so contains key only will be true if the object has that property. Do you mind to test what you are thinking ?
Right, forget my comment, I was only thinking in json with queryparams

BTW, the code-smell that SonarCloud complains, is related to convert "cond-operator" (4 times) into a constant. It may be also applied to "cond-column" and "cond-values", but it's up to you as nice-to-have.
